paras.title: Aesthetic Fillings (Composite Resin)

subcategories.description: Our tooth-colored composite fillings are the perfect solution for repairing cavities, cracks, chips, or worn teeth. These restorations blend seamlessly with your natural teeth, offering durability and an invisible finish for a flawless smile.
Why Choose Aesthetic Fillings At Karisma Specialist Medical Center?

benefits: Preserve Your Teeth: Effectively repairs damage without requiring extraction
Protect Against Decay: Prevents further issues by safeguarding your tooth's sensitive inner layers
Restore Comfort: Allows you to chew and speak without discomfort.
Natural Appearance: Matches your teeth color, maintaining a beautiful and cohesive look.

paras.title: Pulp Capping: Protecting the Core of Your Tooth

subcategories.description: When a tooth has a minor infection or inflammation, pulp capping can save it without resorting to invasive procedures. This gentle treatment removes the affected pulp tissue, covers the healthy portion with a special material, and allows the tooth to heal naturally.

benefits: Save Your Tooth: Keeps the natural pulp alive and functional.
Ease Discomfort: Relieves pain and prevents further infection
Avoid Invasive Treatments: Reduces the need for procedures like root canals.
Maintain Strength: Preserves the tooth’s natural structure and function.

paras.title: Post and Core: Strengthening Severely Damaged Teeth

subcategories.description: When a tooth is severely damaged below the gum line or lacks sufficient structure to support a crown, the post and core procedure provides a reliable solution. A post is inserted into the root canal for stability, and the core is built up around it. A crown is then placed to restore the tooth's strength, function, and aesthetics.
What are the Benefits of Post and Core ?

benefits: Save the Tooth: Avoid extraction by rebuilding its structure.
Create a Strong Foundation: Provides stability for your crown.
Restore Full Functionality: Allows you to chew and smile confidently
Achieve a Natural Look: The final restoration blends seamlessly with your other teeth.
